channel.title: Betting on The Median Duck
channel.description: Recent content in Betting on The Median Duck

item.title: Series 20, Episode 3: The Unnecessary Trilogy
item.description: Your Task Series Scores on the Doors Within-Episode Ranking Distributions End-of-Series Ranking Distributions Joint Cast Ranking Distributions What Have We Learnt Today? Your Task Using the latest data of Series 20 UK Taskmaster (up to Episode 3), generate ranking distributions for each contestant. Ranking distributions should be for within-episode and end-of-series placement, and the joint distribution for the full cast. Bonus points for commenting on how how these distributions have changed since the last episode (Episode 2).

item.title: Series 20, Episode 2: The Disappointing Sequel
item.description: Your Task Series Scores on the Doors Within-Episode Ranking Distributions End-of-Series Ranking Distributions Joint Cast Ranking Distributions What Have We Learnt Today? Your Task Using the latest data of Series 20 UK Taskmaster (up to Episode 2), generate ranking distributions for each contestant. Ranking distributions should be for within-episode and end-of-series placement, and the joint distribution for the full cast. Bonus points for commenting on how how these distributions have changed since the last episode (Episode 1).

item.title: Series 20, Episode 1: Soft Reboot
item.description: Your Task Let’s Start this Chase: New Cast … Same Sort of Analysis What Have We Learnt Today? Your Task Using task data up to and including Episode 1 of Series 20 of Taskmaster UK, generate ranking distributions for each contestant. Ranking distributions should be for within-episode and end-of-series. Bonus points for generating a joint ranking distribution for the full cast of Series 20. Let’s Start this Chase: New Cast … Same Sort of Analysis Figure 1: Let’s Start this Series 20 Chase!
